g++  -std=c++11 -march=native -O3 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/undistort_image.dir/undistort_image.cpp.o  -o undistort_image -Wl,-rpath,/home/pcxlihai/Downloads/Sophus/build:/home/pcxlihai/Downloads/Pangolin/build/src:/usr/local/lib /home/pcxlihai/Downloads/Sophus/build/libSophus.so /home/pcxlihai/Downloads/Pangolin/build/src/libpangolin.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_shape.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.3.4.0 -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lpthread /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.4.0
